```
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    example: cm-template
  name: wildfly-cm-template
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        example: cm-template
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - image: k8spatterns/example-config-cm-template-init ![1](assets/1.png)
        name: init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: "/params"                             ![2](assets/2.png)
          name: wildfly-parameters
        - mountPath: "/out"                                ![3](assets/3.png)
          name: wildfly-config
      containers:
      - image: jboss/wildfly:10.1.0.Final
        name: server
        command:
        - "/opt/jboss/wildfly/bin/standalone.sh"
        - "-Djboss.server.config.dir=/config"
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: "/config"                             ![4](assets/4.png)
          name: wildfly-config
      volumes:                                             ![5](assets/5.png)
      - name: wildfly-parameters
        configMap:
          name: wildfly-cm
      - name: wildfly-config
        emptyDir: {}
```
